3: The Program Ghost twitches. 'Bianca' stands in front of it, slowly disappearing.
You're not getting away this time!
Liv runs the Inver-Device at full power, dashing toward the vanishing 'Bianca' as Lucia and Lee flank her from both sides.
But they are still too late.
'Bianca' vanishes into thin air, leaving only a shadow behind.

2: We're not done yet. Analyze the Program Ghost now!

3: Understood! She doesn't have time to cover up her track now. We'll find her if we just follow it!
